entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Trackback allows the communication between websites. Currently the Xaraya Comments module is storing the trackbacks to your site, and the trackback module is merely recieving and pinging other websites.
entry.translation: Treckbeck elloos zee cummooneeceshun betveee vebseetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Coorrently zee Xereya Cumments mudoole-a is stureeng zee treckbecks tu yuoor seete-a, und zee treckbeck mudoole-a is merely receeefing und peenging oozeer vebseetes.

entry.string: The Xaraya Trackback module follows the Movable Type Spec For more information on how to use trackback, as well as beginner documentation please refer to the specification and user documentation there.
entry.translation: Zee Xereya Treckbeck mudoole-a fulloos zee <Mufeble-a Type-a Spec Fur mure-a inffurmeshun oon hoo tu use-a treckbeck, es vell es begeenner ducoomenteshun pleese-a reffer tu zee speceefficeshun und user ducoomenteshun zeere-a.

entry.string: Trackback provides a display hook for auto-discovery of trackback perma links.
entry.translation: Treckbeck prufeedes a deespley huuk fur ootu-deescufery ooff treckbeck perma leenks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
